DOC.brief_summary: To determine safety , tolerability effect CPG 7909 ( study drug ) give chemotherapy patient melanoma .
DOC.criteria: Histologically cytologically confirm melanoma metastatic . Measurable disease accord RECIST criterion . Karnofsky Performance Status > 70 . Prior treatment antineoplastic biologic chemotherapy recurrent metastatic disease ( except one course adjuvant immunotherapy and/or adjuvant chemotherapy DTIC ) . Suspected known CNS metastasis .
